content: Amazing game,love it
Not horrible but hard to follow
Great story ! Was able to play it for a long time, love that the hint button is fast . Thank you for a great game. Bonus game great , and able to continue to play HOP .
Great
Good game. The hidden roses were tough to spot and some of the objects uses hard to guess but there was plenty of good quality HOP and the mini games were all fun.

I enjoyed it a lot. Puzzles are not difficult but entertaining, beautiful artwork nice music and a good story. Please with the next games can the map button be on the screen instead that you have to go through the menu?

Average - couldn't really put my finger on why this game never really grabbed me. Quite used to ignoring story lines and regular fetch-quests as a 'down side' of this genre, the graphics are fine and HOGS varied...and yet felt like I was just playing this out because I had it, no sense of engagement. OK, but certainly many better examples to spend a few hours on.

i paid for this game like a year ago & i have never even got to play it! i have a good phone, plenty of space to download it and it never works!!!! i am very angry about this and i think i should be able to play a game i paid for! the issue was fixed. love this game!

game works good, but I don't think I got my monies worth I paid over $5, but it seems like the game was hurried in the makings. not much to do in the game. some puzzles are hard to figure out, while others are really easy. may change my mind as I play further into the game.

It's ok, I like the story but the gameplay isnt great. Takes two clicks to get to the map, the instructions for the mini games are... Well I'm not actually sure but I'm not clicking through the entire game guide to find them! I'm not sure how old this game is, but it's showing its age now. If you're used to more up to date ones I think you'll find this difficult
It's a bit short but good graphics and game play
We have just about every big fish game
Good length game. Puzzles not too hard. Different types of hidden object games. Collectibles. Bonus game. 5 ‚≠ê

I want to thank you for keeping up the weekly release  HOS MYSTERY STRATEGY GAME and for fixing glitches cuz I LOVE THIS GAME!!! {{At first I had 3 freeze ups on the HOS'S.  1.) The very 1st HOS on the last object behind the wooden EIPIXstrip. 2.) The 1st HOS on the island won't let me click on ANYTHING.3.) HOS Desk that you open w/wire corkscrew can't click anything. Reinstalling didn't help BUT THE UPDATE TOOK CARE OF IT!!! Thank you very much for listening and taking care of it asap!!!! Nice game just not the easiest to see objects on a Samsung Galaxy S5 smartphone but fun none the less! I reinstalled to play again (last played 4/2016).
Decent length to game play. Decent bonus game

i already purchased the full game but it doesn't download.. it said that the app CAN'T DOWNLOAD.. What should i do now?? Im very disappointed.. please let me have my money back if u can't fix this.. please..
I love it!! Interesting and keeps you guessing!!
Good play time and bonus game!
Finally, A Myths of the World that works!
You can even go back to collect souvenirs
Brilliant
It stopped playing several times.  And then just cancelled and erased my progress. Money back please.
I liked this game, a map would have been nice.

Thank you for a game that I basically paid pennies for but provided me with priceless entertainment! Out of the approximately 75+ Big Fish games I own, this one deserves my comments. Excellent graphics, colour, variety of games and especially the hypnotic snake w/ golden eyes. I was "pulled" into the game as I am temporarily bedridden. I am hooked!
Great game keeps me very interested and awesome story line
Very good game with unique hidden object scenes & puzzles. Some puzzles could  use better instructions.  Bonus round is good also.

Really enjoyed the storyline, the graphics are good, and the puzzles are really challenging but in a fun way, not too difficult. I love that you can go back after the game and find any collectible items that you may have missed during the game. Excellent game! Definitely one of my favorites.
Good story and fun puzzles
Fantastic game brilliant graphics and good story line

Epic and big fish fall down again. Could have been great, but map is hidden in menus and useless, mini games description are very vague, just keep hitting the hint and skip button to play. Not worth a buck let alone 5.
I just love this game.
Play then stop
Great vampire-themed game.  Nice graphics and fun storyline
Have only just started playing the game and so far no glitches, game is quite expensive though, my advice is purchase while on offer! Definitely much better than the other new game just released!

Even thought some vampire facts given were not accurate. Enjoyed the game and it kept me amused for a few hours. Big Fish games are getting very expensive now and soon I will not buy them anymore if they continue to increase in price. Would still recommend this game though if you have the money to spare.
Interesting
So far its ok

I didn't even get 1/4 of the way through, blue screen! This happens all the time with Big Fish, if they open at all. I'd ask for my money back, but it's a waste of time, you guys need to learn from other companies, you're a rip off
A happy surprise.
I like this game but now it won't load
Not bad so far.
Loved this game! ! No glitches. Interactive map, collectibles, morphing objects, fun HOS, and long bonus chapter.
This game is good but the story is short for me .
Good game

I loved the game and it was working perfectly until I went into the manor. It tells me that there isn't anything for me to do and won't let me go anywhere.  It also won't let me select anything in my inventory. I'm really unhappy.
YEA! GLITCHES GONE! THANK YOU EIPIXüåêAND BIG FISHüê≥! LOVE YOU.üíú LOVEüíñYOUR GAMES!!!!!!THANK YOU.üòÉ
Thank you for the update. I was able to finish the game w/out any further problems.
When I quit I lose the entire game and have to re install. Please refund my purchase. Thank u
Great play really enjoyed good graphics great price
Had to download a couple of times but is worki g well at moment

HOP are terrible. I don't really like them compared to the puzzles anyway, but I tolerate them. I had to reboot the game repeatedly because of the glitches. Items could not be collected no matter how many times you click on them. I just downloaded the recent upgrade and that problem wasn't fixed. I finished the game (because that is what one does) but I quit the bonus chapter because of the frustration.
I enjoyed this game. No problems
Black rose
One of the best games I've played in a long time. Great graphics, games, puzzles and some nice twists in the HO.
It got a little glitchy on the HO scenes in some spots, but otherwisea long, fun game! Eipix didn't dial this one in.  Great fun!

Great game play, froze a few times.  Over all, I enjoyed it very much.  Please bring us more games.  I have played all Big Fish  games, we need more maybe 2 at a time.  We need that many for those of us that play all the time.
Had to stop and start during most of HOG. Kept freezing. Please fix.

Problems with all hidden object scenes and about half of puzzles. As the game progressed the responsiveness of these actions slowed progressively until at the end I had to skip them. Backing out and reopening the game seemed to gain me a little ground but in some scenes I had to close and reopen game 5-6 times to progress. It kind of ruined the flow and enjoyment of the game. That's the reason for the 3 stars.
Like the story line, great graphics,  no map sadly and freezing during hog. Would like to see these things fixed, I'm hoping to play again.
Fun and challenging game. My issue is the game freezes on almost all HOS, other then that, it's worth playing at least once.
Like everyone has been saying about the glitches, and not being able to get through the ho scenes. Please fix!! Waiting for an update patiently!
Hidden object games stopped working about 1/2 way through.

Liked the game however glitches with the hog's make it so aggravating having to close game turn off my tablet. Arrrgggg please fix. I buy your games all the time and it really bothers me that no one from Big Fish can even take the time to respond to ALL of these complaints. I hope you do better or I'll just stop buying
you start the game and the first puzzle it locks up!

Great game until chapter 3, the hidden object game won't work and I can't  change it to bubble shooter, it's frozen  and I can't do anything, can't even go to main page, I've restarted and it just comes back to this scene, only way to exit is to turn off my tablet, I've uninstalled and reinstalled  3 times and it's happened at the same place every  time, ?! Every frustrating
A very good game, so far...
Just started playing and 1st HOS doesn't work. Nothing. Please refund my money, or fix it please. Last time I buy a game that doesn't offer a trial.

The tech issues were trouble with downloading then had to reload game on every hog sometimes more than once due to not being able to select anything. The bonus game was also a bit short. STILL other than that it could have been a great game to play.
Very good and fun game need more like it

Very good. Worth the money. The end was a little sudden and anticlimactic, though. Found i had to switch to bubble games too often because hidden object scenes were glitchy at times. Had to use hint more than usual. And some of the minigames  were long and tedious to get through. I like a challenge, but not tedious and super long multiple button taps just to get the right sections to coordinate
The game freezes when I do hidden objects
Like when we had to cut the ladder, the bat emblem inside the coffin or needed to get Simon water, the towel hanging around the barbershop light; found myself using the hint button way too much;

Good story, extras to find (roses, pumpkins, morphing objects,) good length... however, VERY glitchy bonus game- repetitive noises/sounds in the individual bonus game scenes, frozen screens in HOS, etc. I just turned the volume down and prepared to exit the game during the HOS.
Didn't even get a chance to play it

Your games dont even work the last 8 or 9 games havent worked keep freezing and restarting this one is one of the worst do you even read the comments and its no use trying to get a refund coz we wont get one this is the third time unstalling and restalling this game and still not working once you get to a certain part in the game
Game has a lot of issues. Will not play correctly!
It's a good game and interesting
Addictive

Boy oh boy, did I ever have a problem with this one!  First the sound was just terrible that I even downloaded it twice hoping it would fix the problem. No such luck. Secondly, I had a serious freezing problem especially going into puzzles and HO's. That being said, I really enjoyed this game. I love stories like this!  There's lots to do in this game for this vampire hunting gal!
Great game

Good game but having issues with collecting items in HOGs.  Have also had a couple of freeze ups.  Bubble shooter game is kinda crappy but the mini games are fun.  UPDATE:  Further into the I'm having even more problems  with picking up items and freezing.  Lost a star.  SECOND UPDATE:  Had to give up on this at the beginning of the bonus chapter.  Too many feeze ups.  Spoiled the whole thing.  2 more stars gone.

Really enjoyed a lot about this game but the HOG bugs took away from the enjoyment. Engaging story, innovative HOGs, lots to love. But... About the time I hit Chapter 3, the HOGs began to not function. Sometimes you could select nothing, could not back out and eventually could get to bubble shooter and generally finish them that way. Sadly this takes away from the fun,  because the HOGs are one of the reasons you play these games. For the most part, all HOGs after Chapter 3 did this. Fix it & more stars!
Another HOG, but good. If you like the genre, this is a nice one. Not the best I've played, but worth the cost to me.
This one had an awesome story great puzzles. It did freeze up on hidden objects but I still finished the game just a small annoyance. Glad I played this game.
Just started playing. Just entered vampires room, eventually. Took several attempts, even though I was doing it right, to make formula. It's very glitchy üòü. Hopefully gets better
Pretty good so far

I want a refund!! One of the biggest reasons I play these games is for the HIDDEN OBJECT GAMES! Well this game won't let me collect the objects! It also won't zoom in. I can find all of the Hidden Objects I just can't pick them up. I want my money back!!

Kept having to close the app because during the hidden object games, it wouldn't respond when you touched the object.  But after closing the app it would be fine.  These games are getting more and more glitchy Big Fish. Do you not have testers, or quality control?

As always I love the story and graphics. My only complaint is I have had several issues with the hidden object scenes freezing causing me to have to restart the game. Once restarted I needed to complete the scene all over again, some I've had to restart several times. If not for that it would be 5 stars. Reading the other reviews it seems to be a common issue. I'm playing on a Samsung Galaxy Tab S 8.4.
This one has no challenge. Good game but way to simple compared to the other games, or I have just played too many of these games.
Freezes
Enjoyed this game.
Pretty good game. Graphics ok but not great like other games. The mini games are fun and somewhat challanging.
I would have loved it but it kept freezing at the HOS.
Great game, good story line, no problem through out the whole game!!!
Mini games lock up but good story line
Myths: Black Rose
Beautiful game! Fun to play!
Enjoyable game.
Really love this game so far havent finished it yet but I would highly recommend you buy it
Lovely graphics, good gameplay. Decent bonus game. Would have been 5 stars but on some of the HO games the screen froze.
Great game but please sort out the glitch. I have to x off the game and log back on to do the hop games

Was great game until chapter 3 when hidden object scenes would not work, had to swop to bubble shooter instead. Then that decided to be iffy, then had to close then reopen game which I thought would work. Alas still stuck with iffy bubble shooter if it lets me. Hope you don't have problems like I've been having. Good luck fellow gamers. Off to play Lost Lands 2 instead cause I know that it works perfectly! (Using Hudl 2 & never had any problems with any other games). Update. Finished game and bonus with only  hiccups in HOSs.
This game is awesome the story is great and interesting, but with some of the hidden object puzzles it would freeze and it's frustrating.
Fantastic game want more of these .
Story line great,nice game

It was ok, don't zoom in on hidden object puzzles or you won't be able to select anything else unless you close out of the game then reopen it. Some of the puzzles seemed very odd and hard to understand, even for a seasoned player of these types of games. Especially the "riddles" in the HOPs. Had to use hint button way more than usual.  **** In the bonus chapter there's a bad glitch that repeats certain sound effects over and over, I had to play the whole chapter with no sound.
Great game. Keep them coming
Even better than previous. Neat storyline  good mix of puzzles and we'll done graphics - not to dark. I  all... spot on.

Really enjoyed the game, was well worth playing. Am looking forward to the sequal, can no wait. Will be more than happy to pay for more games that are like this from Big Fish as it has all that was promised and anticipated. Also have recommended this game and others by Big Fish that have enjoyed playing to family and friends. We are now in competition with one another to see who can finish the games first. So do please do keep them coming as we are all interested to see as to what will come next.  Many thanks Big Fish.                           From Sarah (SJ) and family
What the Sickens is going on?????The game was fine until the the first hog and it stopped in the middle!!!Not the quality I got used to from BF games!!!!Want a refund!!!!!!!!***
Love the storey line. Amazing graphics and bouns games.

GREAT storyline, HOGS are amazing, map, instructions etc.. All fantastic! Just a few freezes in hogs and game scenes, had to close/reopen a few times. Only had to force close once. Nice long game. Has a few places with very long black screens before next scene, so just give it 5-7 seconds. Brand new game, bugs will get worked out. Everything you'd expect from B.F. games. Oh, and bonus game sounds - ANNOYING!

Wow, it's been quite some time since I've been SO impressed with a BF game. I've only been playing for about 20 min, but if it keeps up the pace it's had so far, I'd say that we've finally gotten a fantastic game from this developer, which, (& no offence to BF intended when I say this bcuz many of their games are great), but, in my opinion, "fantastic" is long overdue! I'm loving all the little extra twists everywhere, especially in the hidden object scenes. They've been such a pleasant surprise! I'll admit that I was a little nervous to purchase, but only bcuz I read several reviews that complained of glitches. Fortunately tho, I've had no problems whatsoever- at least not so far. BTW, to my fellow players; plz, when u review a game & have a technical issue, plz, plz, PLEEEEZ don't forget to include saying what kind of device u're using. It really does matter to those of us trying to decide if we wanna chance paying for the game... esp when there's not a free version to try 1st. Anyhoo, I'll revise this again w/more detail once I've played longer, but like I said, right from the start it's pretty impressive, & I'm really enjoying it! Thx!
Really a good game but I ran into some glitches which is very frustrating please fix!
So far so great

I have tried to install this game twice and each time it freezes when I get to the hidden object game in the swamp. Very disappointed, because I was enjoying the game very much. Please fix this problem.

Eipix gives us a new one in their Myths of the World series. Vampire story is awesome :), teleportation task map, collectible roses on every scene, morphing collectibles on HO scenes, bonus chapter, achievements to earn. Update: Tried reinstalling due to sporadic glitches during HO scenes which won't allow me to select or englarge anything until I restart the game.
Couldn't help it I'm so happy. This game sounds so scarey and creepy. Will comment later after I played for a while.
Another great game by big fish

A real delight again from Big Fish.Clear,sharp graphics and strong story line. I try to play on hardest setting and so far I'm getting through some of the brilliant twisty puzzles. Not too hard or easy but I'm not far in so shall wait and see what's in store. It's a good one
Another well drawn and playful game from Eipix/Big Fish. .. but the vampire theme (and dreary fog/mist often used in these games) are becoming a bit repetitive. ..üòÆ
Nice game. Had to back out of it couple of times to be able to finish a hop. Other than that I'm enjoying it!
Just started and really enjoying it,  graphics and storyline,  usual brilliance from Big Fish.
Good game so far

Boy oh boy do I really like the week to week system they have now sweet , but please let out some of the older ones or newer ones of M.C.F. GAMES-(HEY EIPIX GUYS I HAVE 2 AGREE WITH OTHER GUY ABOUT THE SOUND TRACK BUT FOR ME IT'S EVERYONE OF YOUR GAMES NOT ANY OTHER COMPANIES AND THE ODD THING IS THAT IT'S ONLY WHILE IN HEADPHONE MODE AND IT'S NOT THE HEADPHONES EITHER I CHECKED)....but nonetheless thanks for all your cool games
